headline: Joe Rogan Defends Billionaires, Saying 'They're Working 16 Hours A Day.' He Also Thinks Sharing The Wealth Would Make People Hate Them Less
summary: Comedian Tom Segura joined Joe Rogan for a wide-ranging conversation that included a deep dive into wealth, corporate taxes, and how billionaires are perceived. In the recent episode of “The Joe Rogan Experience,” both acknowledged the shady side of tax loopholes, but Rogan also pushed back against the blanket criticism of ultra-wealthy individuals. Don't Miss: Fast Company Calls It a ‘Groundbreaking Step for the Creator Economy' — Investors Can Still Get In at $0.85/Share An EA Co-Founder Shape
